text: Memorial Day this year is especially important as we are reminded almost daily of the great sacrifices that the men and women of the Armed Services make to defend our way of life.
author: Robin Hayes

text: I'm not denyin' the women are foolish. God Almighty made 'em to match the men.
author: George Eliot

text: The breakdown of the black community, in order to maintain slavery, began with the breakdown of the black family. Men and women were not legally allowed to get married because you couldn't have that kind of love. It might get in the way of the economics of slavery. Your children could be taken from you and literally sold down the river.
author: Kerry Washington

text: Do not put such unlimited power into the hands of husbands. Remember all men would be tyrants if they could.
author: Abigail Adams
